review: I like that I can travel with it and connect to any wifi, ie. hotel, relatives, and enjoy.
author: Celeste Bowman

review: There are not a lot of choice so of Free Movies and/or TV shows the package should include a booklet what can be accessed for free besides the paid services that are being offered.
author: Hector Leguillow

review: Very satisfied with the performance and features.
author: Steve Kodra

review: I love my Fire TV Stick.  I am not good with techy stuff but this was so easy to install and setup and it works perfectly. I have a smart TV so could already stream Netflix directly but wanted the Stick to use with my Prime membership and Fire tablet.  The remote makes it simple. Great job Amazon
author: Kindle Customer

review: It is great, easy to use and easy to program.  I had been using A similar
author: Ed Berlien

review: Loving the fire stick.  We watch movies and TV series as well as play some of the games.
author: Randy Amos

review: Received as gift and returned. You still have to buy subscriptions to all the services this just allows you to access them easily on your tv if you don't have a smart tv, game console, etc to do so for you. I have apps on my xbox and wii which serve the same purpose. I can see its very limited possibilities, but highly dissapointed all the same.
author: Victoria Hunter

review: The interface is laggy and the playback has serious stutter issues when I watch Hulu
author: Raphael Hamzah
